alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:27PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A Cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 500 PM PDT... At 426 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Gibbs Ranch to 17 miles north of Pequop Summit to 8 miles southwest of Montello to 7 miles northeast of West Wendover. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pequop Summit, Oasis, Gibbs Ranch, Montello and Hd Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
